```{r}
library(imager)
```

```{r}
# getwd()

fil <- "../ANG242_2021_10_22_20x_Well_1_Field_5_GFP.png"
# file.exists(fil)
pic <- imager::load.image(fil)
plot(pic, rescale = FALSE)
```



```{r}
start.x <- 100
start.y <- 300
breite <- 500

pic.crop <- imager::imsub(pic,
                x %inr% c(start.x, start.x + breite - 1),
                y %inr% c(start.y, start.y + breite - 1))
plot(pic.crop, rescale = FALSE)
```

```{r}
range(pic)
```


```{r}
range(pic.crop)
```



```{r}
pic.rescale <- (pic.crop - min(pic.crop)) / (max(pic.crop) - min(pic.crop))
plot(pic.rescale, rescale = FALSE)
```
